tool.name: SnpSift dbNSFP
tool.description: Install a dbNSFP variant annotation database
tool.command: #import re data_manager_snpsift_dbnsfp.py #if $db.src == 'softgenetics': --softgenetics "$db.softgenetics_name" #elif $db.src == 'history': #if $db.snpsiftdbnsfp.ext == 'snpsiftdbnsfp': #import os.path --snpsiftdbnsfp "$os.path.join($db.snpsiftdbnsfp.extra_files_path, $db.snpsiftdbnsfp.metadata.bgzip)" #else --dbnsfp_tabular "$db.snpsiftdbnsfp" #end if --db_name "$db.db_name" #if str($db.dbkey).strip() != '': --dbkey "$db.dbkey" #elif str($db.snpsiftdbnsfp.metadata.dbkey) != '?': --dbkey "$db.snpsiftdbnsfp.metadata.dbkey" #end if #end if "$out_file"

param.name: softgenetics_name
param.label: dbNSFP file name at softgenetics ftp site
param.help: Download From: ftp://dbnsfp.softgenetics.com/ Enter the name of the database, e.g.: dbNSFPv3.0c.zip

param.name: snpsiftdbnsfp
param.label: A snpsift dbnsfp from your history
param.help: This can can be generated by converting a tabular file set to type: dbnsfp.tabular

param.name: db_name
param.label: The unique name to give this dbnsfp database

param.name: dbkey
param.label: DBKEY to assign to data to this dbNSFP database

tool.help:
This tool installs dbNSFP_ databases to annotate VCF files using SnpSift_dbNSFP_ It populates data table: snpsift_dbnsfps
.. _dbNSFP: https://sites.google.com/site/jpopgen/dbNSFP .. _SnpSift_dbNSFP: http://snpefIf.sourceforge.net/SnpSift.html#dbNSFP
Please refer to https://sites.google.com/site/jpopgen/dbNSFP for which citations to use with specific dbNSFP database versions.
